mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lecture( category_no, lecture_name, id, room_num, start_date, end_date, lecture_time, lecture_day, lecture_price ) VALUES ( #{categoryNo}, #{lectureName}, #{id}, #{roomNum}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{lectureTime}, #{lectureDay}, #{lecturePrice} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS rnum FROM (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) R, ( SELECT lecture_no lectureNo, lecture_name lectureName, id, room_num roomNum, start_date startDate, end_date endDate, lecture_time lectureTime, lecture_day lectureDay, lecture_price lecturePrice, update_date updateDate, create_date createDate FROM lecture ) a ) b WHERE rnum between ${firstRow} AND ${lastRow}

SELECT lecture_no lectureNo, (SELECT c.category FROM lecture l LEFT JOIN category c ON l.category_no = c.category_no WHERE l.lecture_no = ${lectureNo}) category, lecture_name lectureName, (SELECT DISTINCT t.name FROM lecture l LEFT JOIN teacher t ON l.id = t.id WHERE l.id = (SELECT DISTINCT m.id FROM member m LEFT JOIN lecture l ON m.id = l.id WHERE l.lecture_no = ${lectureNo})) name, room_num roomNum, start_date startDate, end_date endDate, lecture_time lectureTime, lecture_day lectureDay, lecture_price lecturePrice FROM lecture WHERE lecture_no = ${lectureNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE lecture SET category_no = ${categoryNo}, lecture_name = #{lectureName}, id = #{id}, room_num = ${roomNum}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, lecture_time = #{lectureTime}, lecture_day = #{lectureDay}, lecture_price = ${lecturePrice}, update_date = NOW() WHERE lecture_no = ${lectureNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM lecture WHERE (lecture_day = #{arg2} AND (#{arg0} < end_date AND #{arg1} > start_date)) AND (room_num = #{arg3} OR id = #{arg4})
